text: Department of the Treasury Internal Revenue Service
2.3.74.1 Added Program Scope and Objectives with updated mandatory Internal Controls.
Error Message (a) has been updated to reﬂect changes to the acceptable Command Code Deﬁners: Deﬁner ‘
’ has been added to access both IMF and BMF tax processing year
tax return) data, and obsolete Deﬁner ‘
’ has been deleted.
2.3.74-1 Exhibit Description now shows an updated list of acceptable Command Code Deﬁners.
IRM 2.3.74, dated January 15, 2022, is superseded.

You have received a copy of this IRM chapter because you are on the Distribution for IRM 2.3, IDRS Responses. Each chapter has its own catalog number used for ordering and distributing purposes. adjust the subsequent distribution of this chapter to meet your office’s needs by adjusting your quarterly Order Point Summary Report (IMR02).
Table of Contents
2.3.74.2 (01-01-2002) Command Code DDPOL Input Format
IDRS-like paging when display of multiple returns ﬁlls a page.

b. The paging routine will automatically position the cursor following the Start of Message symbol. When the ENTER key is depressed, the terminal will display the next page or any page designated by a page number onto the format by key Input. c. No entry key is needed to move from one page to another. (
) The output screen is shown in Exhibit
) The input screen will be displayed back with one of the following error messages: Code DDPOL a. * * DDPOL REQUIRES A DEFINER
or

—The input DDPOL command code deﬁner is not valid. b. ** INVALID RTN REQUEST—The Routing Transaction is not numeric. c. ** DDPOL FILE UNAVAILABLE—The attempt to access the Duplicate Direct Deposit Database failed. d. ** NO MATCHING RECORD FOUND—There is no information found the requested Routing Transaction Number/Bank Account Number in Duplicate Direct Deposit Database. e. * * ERROR DETECTED IN RETRIEVING DATA, CONTACT PROGRAMMER—An error has occurred when trying to retrieve a on the Duplicate Direct Deposit database. f. ** A PAGING REQUEST WAS ENTERED BEFORE A DDPOL REQUEST—The attempt to retrieve an additional page was performed before an initial DDPOL request was made. g. ** NO ADDITIONAL INFORMATION AVAILABLE FOR THIS ACCOUNT—No additional information exists for requested Routing Transaction Number/Bank Account Number. h. **FILE TYPE CD OF I OR B IS REQUIRED—The input File Type is invalid. (
) The error screen is shown in Exhibit

The paging routine will automatically position the cursor following the Start of Message symbol. When the ENTER key is depressed, the terminal will display the next page or any page designated by overlaying a page number onto the format by key Input. No entry key is needed to move from one page to another.
a. * * DDPOL REQUIRES A DEFINER
or

—The input DDPOL command code deﬁner is not valid. b. ** INVALID RTN REQUEST—The Routing Transaction is not numeric. c. ** DDPOL FILE UNAVAILABLE—The attempt to access the Duplicate Direct Deposit Database failed. d. ** NO MATCHING RECORD FOUND—There is no information found the requested Routing Transaction Number/Bank Account Number in Duplicate Direct Deposit Database. e. * * ERROR DETECTED IN RETRIEVING DATA, CONTACT PROGRAMMER—An error has occurred when trying to retrieve a on the Duplicate Direct Deposit database. f. ** A PAGING REQUEST WAS ENTERED BEFORE A DDPOL REQUEST—The attempt to retrieve an additional page was performed before an initial DDPOL request was made. g. ** NO ADDITIONAL INFORMATION AVAILABLE FOR THIS ACCOUNT—No additional information exists for requested Routing Transaction Number/Bank Account Number. h. **FILE TYPE CD OF I OR B IS REQUIRED—The input File Type is invalid.
